text.__SUMMARY__: Psilocybe puberula is a species of mushroom in the Strophariaceae family. It contains the hallucinogenic drugs psilocybin and psilocin. It was described in 1996 from the Amersfort, Leusderheide, Netherlands, and is also known from Belgium. It is very rare.
